wordGroup: hostile takeover 恶性接收；敌意接管
takeover bid 收购行动；收购竞争；购并出价
takeover offer 收购要约；收购建议

sentences.en: He lost his job in a corporate takeover.
sentences.cn: 他在一次公司收购中丢掉了工作。

sentences.en: Profits fell sharply following the takeover.
sentences.cn: 接管后，利润突然大幅度降低。

sentences.en: There's been a military takeover of some kind.
sentences.cn: 曾发生过一次类似军事接管的事情。
